jedi:matchstick.NAME: Matchstick
jedi:matchstick.FLAVOR: The match is struck. A blazing star is born!
DESCRIPTIONS: NL [#2aecd7]Usable [#2aecd7]once [#2aecd7]per [#2aecd7]combat. NL Gain [E] [E] .

jedi:hotpepper.NAME: Hot Pepper
jedi:hotpepper.FLAVOR: Not only it burns your mouth when you eat it, it also leaves a horrible aftertaste so that any food after it doesn't taste well.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, #rreduce your Max HP by #r35%. Further Max HP increase effects are #rreduced #rby #r50%

jedi:laserpointer.NAME: Laser Pointer
jedi:laserpointer.FLAVOR: Why is it a pointer if it targets everyone?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yLock-On to ALL enemies.

jedi:fakemustache.NAME: Fake Mustache
DESCRIPTIONS: When spending #yGold at the shop, heal #b5 HP.

jedi:endoplasm.NAME: Endoplasm
jedi:endoplasm.FLAVOR: Yes it does work in non-combat rooms. No it's not a bug. No you don't lose gold in blood shop.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first time you lose HP each round, lose #r50 #yGold.

jedi:superconductor.NAME: Superconductor
jedi:superconductor.FLAVOR: You can almost hear orbs going round and round...
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b10 Orbs Channeled, trigger passive effect of ALL Orbs.

jedi:othersneckoeye.NAME: Other Snecko Eye
jedi:othersneckoeye.FLAVOR: The legendary second eye of the snecko, unseen by anyone... Untill now.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 more card each turn. Start each combat with #b2 #yCHAOS. Gain #b1 more #yCHAOS every #b3 turns.

jedi:leadlinedbottle.NAME: Lead-Lined Bottle
jedi:leadlinedbottle.FLAVOR: Unlike other bottles, this one can actually holds its contents properly.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your draw pile.

jedi:scrapmetal.NAME: Scrap Metal
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b15 #yShivs played, add a #yShiv to your hand.

jedi:zontanonomicon.NAME: Zontanonomicon
jedi:zontanonomicon.FLAVOR: You feel invigorated just by holding this Book of Living.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #ySkill played each turn that costs #b2 or more is played twice.

jedi:paperfaux.NAME: Paper Faux
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies with Lock-On take #b75% more damage rather than #b50%.

jedi:firstaidkit.NAME: First Aid Kit
jedi:firstaidkit.FLAVOR: Do you really need a bandage for every byrd peck?
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, gain #b2 Regen.

jedi:leech.NAME: Blood Pack
jedi:leech.FLAVOR: Nope it was always like this.
DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce HP loss from cards and powers by #b1 to a minimum of #b1.

jedi:crownofsimplicity.NAME: Crown of Simplicity
jedi:crownofsimplicity.FLAVOR: Did you really have to remove that Bash?
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStarter cards are played twice.

jedi:heavyjacket.NAME: Heavy Jacket
jedi:heavyjacket.FLAVOR: That's a lot of pockets for a single jacket.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yPlated #yArmor for every #b2 relics you have.

jedi:shrinkray.NAME: Shrink Ray
DESCRIPTIONS: Non-boss enemies have #b
% less HP.
